== Karikkad (CT) (627763) ==

Karikkad (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.66 sq. km. and harbouring 3116 households with total population of 13656 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 330 km. Male population is 6498 and female population is 7158. Scheduled Caste population is 1698 and Scheduled Tribes population is 10. Census Location Code of the town is 627763<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 115 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 35 km.
